Public Sub New (Optional id As Nullable(Of Integer) = null, Optional name As String = null, Optional isActive As Nullable(Of Boolean) = null, Optional phrases As String = null, Optional isExchangeable As Nullable(Of Boolean) = null)

new Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Language.LUIS.Authoring.Models.PhraseListFeatureInfo : Nullable<int> * string * Nullable<bool> * string * Nullable<bool> -> Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Language.LUIS.Authoring.Models.PhraseListFeatureInfo

Docs.param: A six-digit ID used for Features.
Indicates if the feature is enabled.

An exchangeable phrase list feature are serves as single feature to the LUIS underlying training algorithm. It is used as a lexicon lookup feature where its value is 1 if the lexicon contains a given word or 0 if it doesn’t. Think of an exchangeable as a synonyms list. A non-exchangeable phrase list feature has all the phrases in the list serve as separate features to the underlying training algorithm. So, if you your phrase list feature contains 5 phrases, they will be mapped to 5 separate features. You can think of the non-exchangeable phrase list feature as an additional bag of words that you are willing to add to LUIS existing vocabulary features. Think of a non-exchangeable as set of different words. Default value is true.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PhraseListFeatureInfo class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an exchangeable phrase list feature are serves as single feature to the LUIS underlying training algorithm. It is used as a lexicon lookup feature where its value is 1 if the lexicon contains a given word or 0 if it doesn’t. Think of an exchangeable as a synonyms list. A non-exchangeable phrase list feature has all the phrases in the list serve as separate features to the underlying training algorithm. So, if you your phrase list feature contains 5 phrases, they will be mapped to 5 separate features. You can think of the non-exchangeable phrase list feature as an additional bag of words that you are willing to add to LUIS existing vocabulary features. Think of a non-exchangeable as set of different words. Default value is true.
